title: Cloud Hybride Engineer H/F
description:
**Description de l'entreprise**
 Devoteam est un leader du conseil en stratégie digitale, plateformes technologiques, cybersécurité et business transformation.
   

  

  

  

 Avec 10 000 collaborateurs en Europe, Moyen\\-Orient et Afrique, Devoteam accompagne les entreprises en mettant depuis plus de 25 ans la Technologie au service de l’Homme.
   

  

**Zoom sur Devoteam Innovative Tech**
  

  

  

**Devoteam Innovative Tech France** 
 accompagne nos clients dans leurs stratégies de modernisation de plateformes en s'appuyant sur les plus grands Cloud providers du marché et sur des technologies modernes innovantes.
   

  

 Notre communauté  :
   

* \\+ de 1000 collaborateurs experts de leur domaine répartis sous forme de Tribes et Squads, travaillant sur des projets multi\\-cloud et cloud hybride impactants
* Des expertises techniques liées aux enjeux du secteur IT : Hybrid Platform, Cloud \\& DevOps Platform, FinOps \\& Agile@scale, Project et SysOps Automation
* Un environnement technologique stimulant, à travers nos partenaires : Gitlab, OVHcloud, VMware, SUSE, Dynatrace, Hashicorp, VEEAM, etc.
* Une vraie communauté de Tech enthousiastes qui partagent leurs savoirs : événements, Friday Talks sur des sujets techniques, rédaction d'articles...


 Pour en savoir plus sur nos trajectoires de carrière, découvrez le parcours de Nesrine !
   

  

  

**Description du poste**
**Vos principales responsabilités en tant que Cloud Hybrid Vmware Engineer**
 Voici une liste non exhaustive de vos missions au quotidien, nous vous faisons confiance pour les prendre en main et les enrichir à votre façon 😉
   

  

 L’analyse des besoins clients
   

* Participer aux ateliers de cadrage des solutions afin d’étudier les besoins clients
* Aider à la définition d’architectures de Cloud Privé et de Cloud Hybride sur la base de solutions VMWare
* Participer à la conception et la mise en œuvre de solutions VMware Cloud Foundation avec vCenter, VSAN et NSX\\-T
* Participer à la rédaction des documents d'architecture (HLD, LLD, DEX) et de préconisations


 Le déploiement et l’automatisation des architectures VMWare
   

* Mettre en place les outils d’automatisation
* Déployer et industrialiser les architectures cibles
* Mettre en oeuvre les solutions de monitoring adaptées à l’environnement client
* Veiller à la sécurité et la fiabilité des environnements déployés
* Optimiser les performances des différents outils et participer à la résolution d’incidents
* Analyser et proposer des axes d’amélioration sur les architectures pour optimiser les composants


**Participation aux opérations de maintenance**
* Optimiser les performances des infrastructures VMWare et participer à la résolution d’incidents
* Gérer les utilisateurs, les groupes, les rôles et les autorisations
* Gérer la maintenance continue, par exemple l'installation de Service Pack, les correctifs, les mises à jour de logiciels, etc.


 Où réaliserez\\-vous vos missions ? Chez des clients grands comptes de la banque, de l’assurance, de l’industrie, du retail de la Défense, du luxe ou encore de l’énergie, porteurs de projets innovants.
   

  

  

**Qualifications**
**Ce que vous apporterez à la Tribu ?**
 Consultant.e VMWare, issu.e d’école d’ingénieurs ou d’un Master 2 en informatique, vous êtes doté.e d’un excellent relationnel, d’un sens prononcé du service et de la qualité. Vous aimez travailler en équipe, et parlez couramment français et anglais.
   

  

  

  

 Vous avez une première expérience professionnelle sur les technologies et les outils de la virtualisation (KVM, XEN et plus particulièrement VMWare Cloud Foundation, VSphere 6\\.5,6\\.7 ou 7, VRealize Automation, vRealize Orchestrator, VSAN, NSX\\-T, vMotion, DRS, SRM,...). 
   

  

  

  

**Vous connaissez et vous vous voulez progresser sur :**
* les architectures de stockage (NAS/ SAN/ DAS),
* les architectures réseaux et télécoms
* les outils tiers (Terraform, Ansible, Veeam, SCCM, Citrix, PowerShell, …)
* et vous avez un socle de connaissances confirmé en environnement Windows Server, Linux et Kubernetes


 Vous souhaitez affirmer une trajectoire professionnelle vers des sujets d’automatisation d’infrastructure et de cloud privé ou hybride (AWS, Azure, GCP, OVH). 
   

  

 Vous souhaitez développer votre sens critique en tant que consultant.e au regard des problématiques Cloud et des adhérences middlewares aux éléments sous\\-jacents des architectures du système d’information et des applications. 
   

  

**\\[Cherry on the cake🍒]**
 Votre curiosité au sujet des risques liés à la sécurité des infrastructures virtuelles, des normes applicables (ANSSI, NIST, CIS,…) de cybersécurité serait un plus.
   

  

  
   

  

 Et qu’est ce que Devoteam vous offre en échange?
   

* Un CDI, pour se projeter ensemble sur le long terme
* Un salaire attractif en lien avec votre expérience et les tendances du marché


* Une base de travail en Ile de France et un accord télétravail permettant une meilleure flexibilité
* Des avantages comprenant mutuelle, prévoyance santé, CSE, mais aussi des compensations de vos frais internet et installations relatives au télétravail
* Des challenges organisés tout au long de l’année avec de très jolis gains (voyages, matériels technologiques, accès à des événements….)
* Un plan de carrière personnalisé avec des formations et certifications en lien avec votre trajectoire en bénéficiant des cursus, labs, formateurs du premier partenaire AWS en France
* De multiples possibilités de mobilité, géographique mais aussi inter communauté, vous permettant d’évoluer en fonction de vos appétences technologiques ou métier mais aussi selon des projets plus personnels
* Un esprit de communauté fort autour de vos technologies de prédilection, au travers d’événements internes vous permettant d’interagir, célébrer et continuer d’apprendre
* Une réelle possibilité de rayonner et partager vos connaissances et votre vision par le biais de conférences, meetups ou articles
* Plus de 30 clubs Happiness@Devoteam qui te permettent de partager et laisser libre cours à tes passions (running, art, football, musique, gastronomie, yoga, …)


  
   

  

  

**Informations supplémentaires**
**Intéressé.e 🙋‍♀️🙋‍♂️?**
 N’attendez plus et postulez à l’offre!
   

  

 Comment se déroule le processus de recrutement chez Devoteam ? Il comporte 2 à 3 entretiens :
   

* Talent Acquisition Interview : l'objectif est de faire le point sur vos compétences, votre niveau d'anglais et de valider vos éléments de motivation
* Tech \\& Business Interview : cet entretien vise à approfondir vos compétences techniques et à vérifier leur adéquation avec nos besoins lors d'un échange avec un expert métier
* Leadership Interview : il permet d'évaluer votre potentiel, vos ambitions et d'envisager votre évolution au sein de Devoteam.


 Nous privilégions au moins un entretien en présentiel. Une prise de référence est demandée et, selon votre profil, des tests (techniques, anglais, personnalité...) peuvent vous être adressés.
   

  

 Si votre candidature est retenue, nous vous faisons parvenir une proposition présentant les conditions d'embauche. En cas d'acceptation, le contrat de travail est formalisé
   

  

*Le Groupe Devoteam oeuvre pour l'égalité des chances, pour la promotion de ses collaboratrices et de ses collaborateurs au mérite et lutte activement contre toute forme de discrimination. Nous sommes convaincus que la diversité contribue à la créativité, au dynamisme et à l'excellence de notre organisation. Chaque candidature est donc considérée indépendamment de tout critère discriminatoire.*

title: DATA ENGINEER AWS (F/H)
description:
Rejoignez Micropole et devenez un \\#InnovativePeople !
   

  

**Mission**
 Vous êtes convaincus que l’optimisation du
 **patrimoine data des entreprises** 
 est la clé de leur performance ? Vous voulez
 **aider les entreprises** 
 à devenir plus
 **agiles, et à améliorer leur niveau de performance** 
 grâce à la
 **puissance du Cloud ?** 
 Vous voulez rendre les entreprises
 **data intelligentes** 
 et les aider à se transformer au travers des nouvelles technologies qu’amène le
 **cloud** 
 ?
 **Vous souhaitez rejoindre un groupe pionnier des grandes innovations data, cloud et digitales ?**
 Si vous avez
 **répondu « Oui »** 
 à chacune de ces questions alors devenez
 **Consultant Confirmé pour** 
 l’un de nos
 **clients grands\\-comptes** 
 .
   

  

**Prêt(e) à rejoindre l’aventure  Micropole ? N’attendez plus !**
 Dans le cadre du développement de notre entité
 **Cloud4Data** 
 , nous recherchons nos futurs collaborateurs souhaitant developper leur carrière professionnelle dans les enjeux de la Data. Cloud4Data est spécialisée dans la transformation des entreprises par la Data en utilisant toute la puissance des solutions Cloud.
   

  

 Nous accompagnons nos clients par du conseil (stratégie de transformation par la Data) et par de l'expertise (projet de Data Platform) sur leurs principaux enjeux BI, décisionnelles, analytiques, Big Data, AI/ML/GenAI. Nos expertises sont principalement sur AWS, GCP, Microsoft Azure, Snowflake et Databricks. Nos équipes sont principalement constituées d'architecte Data/Cloud, Data ingénieur, Data analyste, Data scientiste et DevOps/SRE.
   

  

**En Tant Que Consultant Confirmé**
 Au sein de notre agence basée à Levallois\\-Perret, vous rejoindrez nos experts Cloud4Data . En tant que Data Engineer Confirmé AWS, vous accompagnerez les directions métiers dans l'évaluation de l'efficacité de leur processus et dans leur stratégie pour optimiser leur performance.
   

  

 Dans vos
 **missions quotidiennes** 
 , vous serez amené(e) à :
   

  

* 40% : développer et maintenir des cas d’usages clients avec les outils et les infrastructures Big Data / Cloud AWS. Modéliser et analyser des données dans le Cloud. Garantir la sécurité / compliance des données ;
* 40% : apporter votre réflexion sur des problématiques métiers à travers l’exploitation et la compréhension des données. Identifier les sources de données les plus pertinentes et restituer des résultats de façon concise et visuelle ;
* 10% : réaliser une veille technologique pour être à la pointe sur les solutions cloud \\& Data ;
* 10% : participer au développement de notre entité Cloud4Data.


**Profil**
**Vos compétences techniques :**
* Vous avez un minimum de 2 années d’expérience sur des projets Data et idéalement au moins une première expérience sur des projets Cloud AWS (EC2, RDS, Lambda, Kinesis, Redshift, EMR, Connect, SageMaker etc),
* Vous maîtrisez au minimum un langage de programmation (Spark, Scala, Python, Java, R) ;
* Vous avez une maitrise des théories et outils de modélisation de données,
* Vous maitrisez des outils et framework d’industrialisation, IaC, CI/CD et/ou gestion de version,
* Vous avez passé au moins une certification AWS technique, et vous avez l’ambition de vous préparer à d’autres.


**Vos atouts**
* Vous êtes passionné(e), rigoureux(se), curieux(se) et à l’écoute ;

**Devenir \\#INNOVATIVEPEOPLE, c’est :**

**La Vie Chez Micropole, C'est**

Depuis ses 14 agences situées en Europe et en Chine, les 1200 \\#INNOVATIVE PEOPLE du Groupe (consultants, Data scientists, architectes IT, experts métiers, ingénieurs, UX designers…) accompagnent leurs clients partout dans le monde sur l'ensemble des phases de leurs projets, du conseil à leur réalisation, et sur la conduite du changement.

title: Devops Engineer
description:
Background
   

  

 Arteris enables engineering and design teams at the world’s most transformative brands to connect and integrate today’s system\\-on\\-chips (SoCs) that fuel modern innovation.
   

  

 If you’ve held a smartphone, driven an electronic car, or powered up a smart TV, you’ve come in contact with what we do at Arteris. Here, the future is quite literally in your hands—and when it isn’t, chances are it is flying overhead in a drone, a satellite, or in the cloud at a datacenter!
   

  

 As a
 ***Senior Staff** 
**DevOps Engineer***
 at Arteris your role will be to setup, deploy, maintain, and continuously improve engineering solutions and services used by the engineering teams in production.
   

  

**Technical Skills**
* Automation and CI/CD
+ Mastery of automation tools (e.g. Jenkins, GitLab CI/CD)
+ Proficiency in scripting languages (e.g. Python, Bash, TCL)
+ Expertise in continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) practices

* Grid \\& High\\-Performance Computing
+ Familiar with grid computing systems and distributed systems
+ Knowledge of techniques for managing and scheduling resources in a grid environment

* Containerization and Orchestration
+ Proficiency with containerization solutions (Docker, Podman)
+ Knowledge about containers orchestrators
- Kubernetes, OpenShift or Docker Swarm

+ Managing and securing containerized applications

* Infrastructure as Code (IaC)
+ Experience with IaC tools (e.g., Terraform, CloudFormation, Ansible)
+ Ability to manage and provision infrastructure through code

* Cloud Services
+ Good understanding of cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, Google Cloud)
+ Managing and securing cloud infrastructure

* Artificial Intelligence \\& Machine Learning
+ Exposure to AI/ML model building, model hosting, RAG, and LLMs is a plus

* Hands\\-on experience
+ 5\\+ years of experience in a DevOps role
+ Strong knowledge of Linux OS (RHEL, SLES)
+ Experience on Git versioning system


**Operational Skills**
* Monitoring and Logging
+ Implementing and managing monitoring tools (e.g. Prometheus, Grafana, ELK Stack)
+ Analyzing logs to detect and resolve issues

* Performance Optimization
+ Identifying and resolving performance bottlenecks
+ Ensuring high availability and scalability of systems

* Security Practices
+ Implementing security best practices and compliance
+ Conducting vulnerability assessments and penetration testing


**Collaborative Skills**
* Communication and Collaboration
+ Fluent in French and in English
+ Good written and verbal communication skills
+ Agile methodologies and tools (Kanban/Scrum)

* Problem\\-Solving and Analytical Thinking
+ Proactively identifying and mitigating risks
+ Analyzing complex systems to find and fix issues


**About Arteris**
 Arteris is a leading provider of system IP for the acceleration of system\\-on\\-chip (SoC) development across today’s electronic systems. Arteris network\\-on\\-chip (NoC) interconnect IP and SoC integration automation technology enable higher product performance with lower power consumption and faster time to market, delivering better SoC economics so its customers can focus on dreaming up what comes next.
   

  

 With over 250 employees with headquarters in Silicon Valley and offices around the globe, we are a catalyst for SoC innovation so companies ranging from startups to the biggest technology market leaders can effectively create new products with proven connectivity flexibility and ease.
   

  

 Learn more at http://arteris.com
   

  

 Arteris permet aux équipes d'ingénierie et de conception des entreprises les plus innovantes au monde de connecter et d'intégrer les systèmes sur puce (SoC) nécessaires aux transformations à venir.
   

  

 Si vous avez tenu un smartphone, conduit une voiture électronique ou allumé une télévision intelligente, vous avez été en contact avec ce que nous faisons chez Arteris. Ici, l'avenir est littéralement entre vos mains \\- et quand ce n'est pas le cas, il y a de fortes chances qu'il soit dans un drone qui vous survole, un satellite ou dans le nuage d'un centre de données !
   

  

 En tant que Senior Staff DevOps Engineer chez Arteris, votre rôle sera de créer, déployer, maintenir et améliorer continuellement des solutions et services exploitées en production par les équipes d’ingénierie.
   

  

**Compétences techniques**
* Automatisation et CI/CD
+ Maîtrise des outils d’automatisation (e.g. Jenkins, GitLab CI/CD)
+ Bonnes connaissances de langages de scripting (e.g. Python, Bash, TCL)
+ Expertise des bonnes pratiques d’intégration et de déploiement continus (CI/CD)

* Grille informatique \\& calcul haute performance
+ Familier avec les systèmes de calcul distribués
+ Bonnes connaissances des techniques pour gérer et planifier les resources

* Conteneurisation et Orchestration
+ Solides compétences en solutions de conteneurisation (Docker, Podman)
+ Connaissances des solutions d’orchestration
- Kubernetes, OpenShift or Docker Swarm

+ Gestion et sécurisation d’applications conteneurisées

* Infrastructure as Code (IaC)
+ Experience avec des outils d'IaC (e.g., Terraform, CloudFormation, Ansible)
+ Capable de gérer et provisionner des éléments d’infrastructure via code

* Services dans le Cloud
+ Connaissances des plateformes cloud (e.g., AWS, Azure, Google Cloud)
+ Gestion et sécurisation d’une infrastructure cloud

* Intelligence Artificielle \\& Apprentissage Automatique
+ L’exposition à la création, l’hébergement de modèles IA (RAG, LLM) est un plus

* Expérience pratique
+ 5\\+ années d'expérience dans un rôle de DevOps
+ Solides connaissances de Linux OS (RHEL, SLES)
+ Bonne expérience de Git


**Compétences Opérationnelles**
* Monitoring et Log
+ Implémentation et gestion d’outils de monitoring (e.g. Prometheus, Grafana, ELK Stack)
+ Analyze des logs pour détecter et résoudre les problèmes

* Optimisation des Performances
+ Identification et résolution des goulots d’étranglement de performances
+ Assurer la disponibilité et la scalabilité des systèmes

* Sécurité
+ Connaissances des bonnes pratiques en termes de sécurité et de conformité
+ En mesure d’effectuer des tests de pénétration et analyses de vulnérabilités


**Compétences Collaboratives**
* Communication et Collaboration
+ Français et anglais courants
+ Bonnes compétences d’expression écrite et orale
+ Connaissance des méthodes Agile et outils associés (Kanban/Scrum)

* Résolution de problèmes et Réflexion Analytique
+ Identification et mitigation des risques de manière proactive
+ Analyser des systèmes complexes pour identifier et résoudre les problèmes


 À propos d'Arteris
   

  

 Arteris est l'un des principaux fournisseurs d'IP système pour l'accélération du développement de systèmes sur puce (SoC) dans les systèmes électroniques d'aujourd'hui. La propriété intellectuelle d'interconnexion de réseaux sur puce (NoC) et la technologie d'automatisation de l'intégration des systèmes sur puce d'Arteris permettent d'accroître les performances des produits tout en réduisant la consommation d'énergie et en accélérant la mise sur le marché, ce qui se traduit par une amélioration de l'économie des systèmes sur puce et permet aux clients de se concentrer sur l'élaboration des prochaines innovations.
   

  

 Avec plus de 250 employés, un siège dans la Silicon Valley et des bureaux dans le monde entier, nous sommes un catalyseur de l'innovation SoC pour que les entreprises, des startups aux plus grands leaders du marché technologique, puissent créer efficacement de nouveaux produits avec une flexibilité et une facilité de connectivité éprouvées. Pour en savoir plus, consultez le site www.arteris.com

title: Cloud & Data Engineer
description:
**Qui sommes\\-nous ? 🤔**
 SFEIR, c'est une communauté dynamique de 900 experts de la tech, répartis en France, Belgique et Luxembourg.
   

  

 Nous accompagnons nos clients dans :
   

  

 Le développement d'applications web et mobiles pour optimiser l'expérience utilisateur.
   

  

 L'évolution de leurs architectures SI, Cloud et Data pour être en phase avec les technologies de demain.
   

  

 La valorisation des données et l'innovation avec l'IA.
   

  

 La création de valeur à travers les API et microservices.
   

  

**Notre culture d'entreprise**
 Nous sommes passionnés par l'expertise technologique, la transmission de savoirs et le respect de valeurs essentielles : bienveillance, inclusivité, excellence, liberté et responsabilité.
   

  

**SFEIR Paris en chiffres**
 400 experts, dont 100 spécialisés en Data
   

  

 70 clients actifs en Ile\\-de\\-France et 120 à l'échelle du groupe
   

  

 41 Engineering Managers pour un suivi personnalisé
   

  

 370 certifications obtenues en 2024
   

  

 Des événements mensuels (afterworks, meetups, formations)
   

  

 Une communauté active avec une cinquantaine de conférences en 2024 (Devoxx, DevFest,...)
   

  

**Vos missions 🛠️**
 Ton rôle est d'appréhender le contexte et implémenter une plateforme pour valoriser sa donnée. Tu es à l'aise sur Python et SQL / DBT.
   

  

 Par exemple, Vincent construit la plateforme de données d'une société historique de livraison et de suivi de colis. Cette plateforme a pour vocation d'aider au pilotage opérationnel de l'activité et doit être suffisamment évolutive pour accueillir les besoins qu'exprimeront les équipes métiers.
   

  

 Stack technique : BigQeury, Cloud Composer, Python, DBT
   

  

**Opportunités d'évolution 🎯**
 Vous bénéficierez de nombreuses possibilités de progression, tant verticales qu’horizontales :
   

  

 Devenir évaluateur·rice dans le processus de recrutement.
   

  

 Former à travers les SFEIR Schools ou SFEIR Institute.
   

  

 Intervenir en tant que speaker lors de conférences, meetups, ou rencontres avec des écoles.
   

  

 Devenir Engineering Manager tout en restant dans la technique.
   

  

 D'autres opportunités selon vos envies, discutées au cas par cas.
   

  

**Rémunération 💼**
 Chez SFEIR, pas de grille salariale figée ! Chaque rémunération est discutée individuellement, en fonction de votre profil et de vos aspirations. Rejoignez\\-nous et exprimez pleinement votre expertise Java dans un environnement stimulant et bienveillant ! 🚀
   

  

*SFEIR collecte vos données à caractère personnel afin de traiter votre candidature. Pour en savoir plus sur la gestion de vos données personnelles et pour exercer vos droits, nous vous invitons à consulter notre Politique de confidentialité .*

title: Cloud Architect
description:
Licorne Society a été missionné par une FinTech en pleine croissance pour les aider à trouver leur Cloud Architect.
   

  

**Description Du Poste**
 En tant que Cloud Architect Senior, vous serez responsable de la conception, de la mise en
   

  

 œuvre et de la gestion de notre infrastructure cloud, principalement sur AWS. Vous allez
   

  

 collaborer étroitement avec nos équipes de développement et de données pour garantir des
   

  

 solutions évolutives, sécurisées et performantes.
   

  

**Responsabilités principales**
* Concevoir et optimiser l’architecture cloud en fonction des besoins business et techniques de l'entreprise.
* Gérer et superviser l’infrastructure cloud pour assurer une haute disponibilité, une sécurité optimale et des performances accrues.
* Mettre en place des solutions d’automatisation et de monitoring pour garantir une exploitation efficace et sans interruption.
* Collaborer avec les équipes de développement, data science et business pour déployer des solutions innovantes.
* Assurer la conformité et la sécurité des données en mettant en œuvre des stratégies de protection et des bonnes pratiques sur le cloud.
* Effectuer des audits réguliers et proposer des améliorations continues pour l’infrastructure existante.
* Rester à jour sur les nouvelles technologies cloud et recommander des évolutions à intégrer dans notre architecture.


**Compétences requises**
* Solide expertise en architecture cloud, avec une maîtrise approfondie d’AWS et de ses différents services (EC2, S3, RDS, Lambda, etc.).
* Connaissances avancées en infrastructures “as code” (Terraform, CloudFormation).
* Compétence en scripting (Python, Shell).
* Expérience avec des bases de données (SQL, NoSQL) et des solutions de stockage cloud.
* Compréhension des concepts de sécurité cloud, de réseaux et de conformité (ISO 27001, RGPD).
* Capacité à travailler en équipe tout en étant autonome dans la prise de décision technique.
* Excellentes compétences en communication, avec la capacité de vulgariser des concepts complexes pour des non\\-techniciens.
* Anglais courant, la maîtrise d’autres langues européennes serait un plus.


**Profil recherché**
* Diplômé(e) d’une grande école d’ingénieurs ou d’un équivalent universitaire de haut niveau.
* Minimum de 5 ans d’expérience en architecture cloud, idéalement dans un environnement similaire.
* Vous êtes rigoureux(se), organisé(e) et doté(e) d’un fort esprit d’analyse.
* Vous êtes passionné(e) par les nouvelles technologies, avec un goût prononcé pour l’innovation et l’exploration de nouvelles solutions.


**Pourquoi rejoindre l'entreprise ?**
* Travailler au sein d’une équipe internationale, ambitieuse et talentueuse.
* Participer activement à des projets innovants dans un environnement stimulant.

title: Cloud Engineer

title: DevOps Engineer - Fintech Innovante - Paris - CDI H/F
company: Kicklox - Plateforme de matching entre talents tech & porteurs de projets
description:
À propos de l'entreprise
   

  

 Les secteurs d'activité Automobile, Aéronautique, Spatial, Défense \\& Sécurité, Ferroviaire, Télécommunications, Energie, Services \\& Systèmes d'Informations, Chimie / Pétrochimie, Digital \\& E\\-Commerce, Naval, Machines \\& Industrie Lourde, Pharmaceutique / Biotechnologie, Banque \\& Assurance, BTP Présentation Expert en Assistance Technique, Recrutement et Formation dans les secteurs IT, Électronique \\& IoT. Nous propulsons votre carrière et accélérons vos projets IT \\& Industrie 4\\.0 avec des solutions sur mesure. Transformez vos ambitions en réalité avec notre accompagnement dédié.  L'offre
   

  

 Secteurs Digital \\& E\\-Commerce, Banque \\& Assurance Missions à réaliser Contexte du poste

Situés au coeur de Paris, nous opérons dans un secteur dynamique mêlant blockchain et finance décentralisée. Pour accompagner notre croissance et renforcer notre infrastructure, nous recherchons un DEVOPS Engineer. Vous rejoindrez notre département Cloud et Infrastructure, jouant un rôle crucial dans notre expansion.
   

  

 Missions

 Pourquoi nous rejoindre ?

 Si vous êtes prêt(e) à relever ce défi captivant et à contribuer à l'avenir du secteur financier, postulez dès maintenant pour rejoindre notre aventure !
   

  

 Modalités

* Rémunération : 45000 € \\- 60000 € par an selon expérience

 Le profil recherché
   

  

 Compétences requises Cloud infrastructure AWS, Docker, Python, Kubernates, Terraform Description du profil Profil du candidat
   

  

**Profil Recherché**

title: Software QA Engineer - Internship
description:
**Company Description**
**LIVE THE MUSIC WITH US**
 From a pioneer tech start\\-up created in 2007, Deezer has become one of the first French unicorns and the second largest independent music streaming platform in the world.
   

  

 At sixteen years old, we’re only just coming of age. Now listed on \\#EuroNext, Deezer is a rapidly\\-growing, cutting\\-edge player in the music streaming market. If you want an environment where you can make your voice heard and be at the forefront of music and tech, look no further!
   

  

 We believe music is all about embracing the things that make us different.
   

  

 Deezer is a vibrant community that celebrates uniqueness, diversity and individuality, and thrives on collaboration.
   

  

 Our international and passionate teams pride themselves on being at the forefront of the music experience, going beyond streaming and helping the world to Live the Music. We’re constantly evolving alongside our customers, partners, artists and employees — striving to make Deezer the most personal and innovative streaming service in the world.
   

  

 Ready for an electrifying journey? Apply now and do your part in bringing extraordinary music experiences to people’s lives!
   

  

* Join Us\\*\\*


**Job Description**
 We are looking for a QA Analyst Intern to join our Customer and Monetization group—a dynamic team dedicated to attracting new users, managing account access, monetizing free services with ads, converting users to paid plans, enhancing payment experiences, and improving customer relationship tools.
   

  

 As an intern, you’ll work closely with our QA experts to plan and conduct various types of testing, including manual, automated, and exploratory testing. You will also be responsible for writing and maintaining automation scripts using Java for both mobile and web platforms, and participate in team meetings and development processes.
   

  

**What you will do:**
* Assist in planning and executing manual tests, including UI, API, and exploratory tests.
* Help write and maintain test cases and related documentation for ongoing projects.
* Track and update the bug backlog, writing clear and detailed bug reports.
* Analyze and report the results of automated tests.
* Support the development and maintenance of automated tests using Appium and Selenium.
* Collaborate with product and tech teams to understand project goals and challenges.
* Participate in team meetings to discuss project progress and testing strategies.
* Continuously learn and apply best practices in software testing and quality assurance.


 Qualifications
   

  

 This role is excellent for a person with:
   

  

* Basic knowledge of the Java programming language, programming logic and principles
* Understanding of common software testing types, methodologies, and techniques
* Familiarity with the Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) and tools like Jira and GitHub
* Ability to collaborate effectively with team members within QA and across other departments
* Good oral and written communication skills in English and French
* Strong problem\\-solving skills and attention to detail
* Eagerness to learn and adapt in a dynamic environment


 Would be a plus
   

  

* Familiarity with Agile methodologies and teamwork


***If you don’t meet 100% of the qualifications outlined above, tell us why you’d still be a great fit for this role in your application!***
 Additional Information
   

  

**Life @ Deezer HQ:**
* Start\\-up environment with an at\\-home vibe and outdoor space
* Kitchen stocked with free drinks and snacks daily
* Friday drinks \\& seasonal parties
* A stocked kitchen with free drinks and snacks
* Gym access, plus yoga, pilates and boxing classes
* English and French language courses
* Hackathons \\& meetups


*We are an equal opportunity employer.*

title: DevOps / SRE Engineer - 5 ans d'xp minimum post formation
description:
Une MedTech en pleine croissance recherche un

title: Cloud Security Architect F/H
description:
Job Description
 




 The Cloud Security Architect is responsible for designing, implementing, and managing the organization’s cloud security architecture. This role involves collaborating with various departments, including IT, business units, and compliance teams, to ensure that cloud security measures are effectively integrated and managed.
 



 The Cloud Security Architect plays a crucial role in safeguarding the organization’s cloud infrastructure by designing and implementing robust security solutions. The Architect ensures that the organization’s cloud security strategies are aligned with business objectives and regulatory requirements.
 



 This is a group role, requiring coordination of activities across the organization and collaboration with local stakeholders to continuously monitor and improve cloud security practices in response to the evolving cyber threat landscape.
 







**Main Responsibilities** 
 :
 



**Cloud Security Implementation and Management:** 



* Collaborate with different departments to implement and manage cloud security solutions.
* Engage with Business Owners, IT, architects, and Operational Security teams to understand and address cloud security requirements.
* Conduct regular security assessments and analyses to identify potential security gaps in the cloud infrastructure.
* Develop and monitor KPIs to measure the effectiveness of cloud security efforts.
* Hands on experience with Azure and AWS to assess feasibility and alternative solutions
* Ability to develop internal tools and scripts to automate data gathering and technical risk assessment



**Cloud Security Architecture Design:** 



* Lead the design and implementation of cloud security architecture practice.
* Ensure that cloud security measures meet the organization’s security objectives.
* Coordinate with cross\\-functional teams and local teams to ensure cohesive cloud security efforts.
* Coordinate cloud security projects and ensure alignment with policies and regulations



**Reporting and Documentation** 



* Ensure comprehensive documentation of cloud security activities.
* Produce regular reports on cloud security status and KPIs for various committees.
* Prepare detailed security assessment reports and present findings to senior management and stakeholders.



  




 Preferred Experience
 * **Master’s degree in information** 
 security, cloud computing, or related field, or equivalent work experience.
* **5\\+ years in cloud security or related fields.**
* Experience in designing and implementing cloud security solutions.
* Knowledge of main cloud security frameworks and standards (e.g., CSA, NIST, ISO/IEC 27017\\).
* Hands\\-on on at least Azure or AWS.
* Knowledge of Office365, Modern Workplace and identity management is a plus
* Insurance and financial industry experience is a plus.
* **Fluent English is a must.**
* Relationship building and stakeholder management capabilities.
* Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
* Strong attention to detail.
* **Strong working knowledge of cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, Google Cloud).**


 Recruitment Process
 
 1/ HR 
 



 2/ N\\+1 
 



 3/ Optional : technical test, N\\+2, culture fit
 


 Additional Information
 * Contract Type:
 **Full\\-Time**
* Location:
 **Saint\\-Denis**
* Education Level:
 **Master's Degree**
* Experience:
 **\\> 5 years**
* **50% remote**


 About
 
 With over million customers around the world and 12,000 employees in 37 countries, Europ Assistance is the 2nd global player of assistance services in 3 areas: travel, mobility, and personal care. Founded in 1963, Europ Assistance, the inventor of assistance, supports customers in over 200 countries and territories thanks to our network of 750\\.000 approved providers.
 



 Our mission is to bring people from distress to relief – anytime, anywhere. We provide automobile assistance, travel assistance and insurance services, as well as personal assistance services such as the protection of the elderly, the protection of digital identity, telemedicine and the Conciergerie. The company vision, shared by our 12,000 employees, is to prove every day that we are the most reliable care company in the world, and to make our people proud of who we are, what we do, and, how we do it.
 



 Europ Assistance is part of the Generali Group, one of the world’s leading insurers. It is with the support and commitment of Generali, its shareholder, that the Europ Assistance Group has become the world leader in its sector. As long\\-standing partners, the two entities are jointly committed to future\\-oriented projects.
 



 Our promise and tagline, "You Live, We Care" is what we stand for every day. We are a care business, delivered by people. "We care" means that we are caring, available, reliable and easy to work with. Our employees bring those values to life.
 



 As a leader in the assistance industry, we are looking for a passionate, committed, and self\\-driven talent to help us shape the future of the industry.
 



 Europ Assistance is committed to inclusion and non\\-discrimination. We act in favor of disability, social diversity and equality. Above all, we recruit skills and personalities, and diversity within our teams is key because it is a source of innovation and performance.
 



**Make an impact, join Europ Assistance!**

title: Senior Cloud Architect
description:
**Job Description**
 Oracle Consulting organization is responsible for delivering specialized consulting services to clients and supporting sales activities related to Oracle Cloud Services. We are the experts that other experts seek out for leading practices in Oracle Cloud with our deep know\\-how and proven expertise from implementing countless cloud journeys. If you’re an excellent communicator with a passion for empowering business innovation, this is your opportunity to stand out! We are looking for a DBA \\& Cloud Architect to join our Infrastructure \\& platform Consulting team in France.
   

  

**What You’ll Do**
 Your role will be to work with Oracle customers to assist them with their transformation IT Cloud . This could involve anything from a day’s assistance on resolving a specific issue right through to a project lasting many months to design and implement a new high architecture No two customers are the same so this role will be exciting and challenging, and you will have the opportunity to work on some of the biggest implementations in France running important applications.
   

  

**What You’ll Bring**
 You have that rare combination—a sharp technical brain and a head for business. You’ll use this to help customers achieve real\\-world success with our products. We also look for:
   

  

* A proven consulting experience implementing Oracle (Technology) solutions.
* Ability to encourage and engage with senior partners based on content (technology knowledge, transformation approach, adoption centricity)
* Fluency in English \\& French


**Required skills:**
* Proven experience on IaaS, PaaS solutions on OCI or AWS, Azure, GCP
* knowledge of Oracle RDBMS Database Architecture with different option ( \\> 8 years Experience)
* Excellent knowledge and experience of High Availability solutions
* Proficient knowledge of Oracle Database, Data Architecture design and database server infrastructure
* Technical knowledge on ML and AI
* Proved and extensive knowledge of modern application architecture deployments in Cloud
* Proved and extensive knowledge of migration methodologies and solutions from On Premise to Cloud
* knowledge of Virtualization solutions like OVM and VMWare, network design and administration
* Experience of working in environments using Kubernetes DevSecOps and DataOps solutions
* Deep understanding of how to design and build secure, scalable and resilient platforms on Cloud
* Excellent presentation and negotiation skills
* Able to write infrastructure as code using Cloud technologies.
* Able to use a CI/CD pipeline to deploy applications on Cloud.


**Advantageous but not crucial:**
* Experience in using GITHUB is preferable but not required.
* Oracle golden Gate experience
* Knowledge of RDBMS technology like MongoDB, Snowflake and SQL Server.


**What We Offer!**
 We give you the freedom, skills, tools, and technologies to craft your future. Whatever avenue you go down, you’ll gain access to
 **immense learning experiences,** 
 and you’ll always be backed\\-up by
 **Oracle’s impressive resources.**
* Good work/life balance
* Employee resource groups that champion our diverse Communities
* An inclusive culture that celebrates what makes you outstanding.


 An international culture that is vibrant, dynamic, and encouraging helping you reach your full potential.
   

  

 Career Level \\- IC4
   

  

**About Us**
 As a world leader in cloud solutions, Oracle uses tomorrow’s technology to tackle today’s problems. True innovation starts with diverse perspectives and various abilities and backgrounds.
   

  

 When everyone’s voice is heard, we’re inspired to go beyond what’s been done before. It’s why we’re committed to expanding our inclusive workforce that promotes diverse insights and perspectives.
   

  

 We’ve partnered with industry\\-leaders in almost every sector—and continue to thrive after 40\\+ years of change by operating with integrity.
   

  

 Oracle careers open the door to global opportunities where work\\-life balance flourishes. We offer a highly competitive suite of employee benefits designed on the principles of parity and consistency. We put our people first with flexible medical, life insurance and retirement options. We also encourage employees to give back to their communities through our volunteer programs.
   

  

 We’re committed to including people with disabilities at all stages of the employment process. If you require accessibility assistance or accommodation for a disability at any point, let us know by calling \\+1 888 404 2494, option one.
   

  

**Disclaimer:**
 Oracle is an Equal Employment Opportunity Employer\\*. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability and protected veterans’ status, or any other characteristic protected by law. Oracle will consider for employment qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records pursuant to applicable law.
   

  

* Which includes being a United States Affirmative Action Employer

title: Site Reliability Engineer
description:
About us
========



Owkin is building the first universal AI Operating System called K to lay the foundation for Biological Artificial Superintelligence (BASI). This OS integrates a suite of AI agents that decode complex biology, accelerate research, and dramatically increase productivity. Acting as copilots, Owkin K agents will automate drug discovery and diagnostics and power next\\-gen pharma companies.



Owkin's OS will be powered by the world's largest federated multimodal patient data network, a robotized lab, leading AGI technologies, and cutting\\-edge multimodal foundation models and LLMs.



**About the role:**
===================



Within the Diagnostic team, our ambition is to potentiate precision diagnosis in oncology with artificial intelligence applied to digital pathology. Pathology slide images, taken from biopsied or resected tissues, are a yet\\-untapped, ultra\\-high dimensional data modality that offer a huge potential for deep learning application to better understand disease, optimize patient care \\& improve treatment decisions.



You will be in charge of creating and designing the IT architecture for Owkin software products to enable their deployment at external sites (hospitals, private labs, research labs…) for use in either clinical studies or clinical routine. You will also be in charge of deploying Owkin software products on these external sites.


**In particular, you will:**
============================


* Lead technical presentations and workshops dedicated to the design of the target solution with Partners' IT teams and/or within Owkin, both on\\-premise and on the cloud.
* Provide detailed specifications for the proposed IT solutions including hosting specifications, network flow matrix, RACI and security and you will document them.
* Be familiar with a wide range of technologies (DevOps, GitOps, Open Source software) and infrastructure (from physical server via lower layers to Kubernetes architecture concepts \\& solutions)
* Contribute to Infra as Code (documentation, scripting) with the DevOps team.
* Deploy Owkin software products according to established specifications.
* Support the Customer Support team by being the first technical interface in initial technical meetings with customers, but also in the case of technical investigations.
* Run the production environment by monitoring availability and taking a holistic view of system health, and manage the full product lifecycle (including decommissioning).
* Partner with development teams to improve services through rigorous testing and release procedures.
* Work in a multidisciplinary team of solution architects, site reliability engineers and software engineers.

**About you**
=============



Required qualifications / experience:


* MSc or BSc or equivalent degree in computer science or software engineering or an associated field
* 3 years (or equivalent) of industrial experience on critical infrastructure and on architecture design for industries such as healthcare, insurance, finance or military
* Good knowledge in several areas amongst :
	+ Public Cloud (GCP, AWS, Azure, etc.)
	+ Distributed storage technologies (NFS, HDFS, Ceph, S3, etc.)
	+ Network (NAT, VPN, firewall)
	+ Operating Systems (Linux/Unix\\-like) and Hypervisor
	+ Containers \\& orchestration (Docker, Kubernetes)
	+ Automation (Flux, Ansible, Terraform)
	+ Monitoring and alerting tools (Prometheus)
	+ DevOps, GitOps, CI/CD, APIs, security
* Knowledge of development collaboration tools (git, Jira)
* Experience in cyber security and applicable standards (in particular ISO 27001\\)
* Highly organized and meticulous about details, capable of tackling complex problems logically and effectively, able to deliver in a dynamic and fast\\-paced environment.
* Good communication and efficient interaction with stakeholders and clients, promotion of partnership spirit, fluent in English (French is a plus)
* Able to coordinate several threads of discussions \\& projects in parallel at various stage of progress


Preferred qualifications/bonus:


* A TOGAF or a Cloud Architect (AWS SA / AZ\\-104\\) certification is a plus
* French is a plus


**Please submit your CV in English**  

  

Internal use: \\#LI\\-CJ1



What we offer
=============


* Flexible work organization
* Friendly and informal working environment
* Opportunity to work with an international team with high technical and scientific backgrounds

Recruitment Process \\& Security
===============================


* Please complete the form and submit your CV.
* Owkin is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, sex, gender, sexual orientation, age, color, religion, national origin, protected veteran status or on the basis of disability.
* Owkin is a great place to work. Unfortunately, being a coveted workplace means we are vulnerable to recruitment phishing scams. We urge all job seekers and candidates to be wary of potential scams. Most of these have individuals posing as representatives of prominent companies, including Owkin, with the aim of obtaining personal, sensitive, or financial information from applicants. These scams prey upon an individual's desire to obtain a job and can sometimes "feel" like a genuine recruitment process. Some red flags are identified below. Should you encounter a recruitment process that claims to be for Owkin but is not consistent with the below, please do not provide any personal or financial information:
* Legitimate Owkin recruitment processes include communication with candidates through recognized professional networks, such as LinkedIn.
* Communication is always through an official Owkin email address (from the @owkin.com domain), over the phone or though our applicant tracking system (Greenhouse).
* The Owkin talent team do use platforms such as LinkedIn and Job Teaser, however if you have any concern or doubt about this contact, please ask for them to send an email from @Owkin.com.
* The Owkin talent team will not solicit personal data from candidates during the application phase including, but not limited to, date of birth, social security numbers, or bank account information;
* Legitimate Owkin interviews may be conducted over the phone, in person, or via an approved enterprise videoconferencing service (Google Meets). **They will not occur via Signal, Telegram or Messenger**
* Owkin offers of employment are based on merit and only extended once a candidate has interviewed with members of the talent and hiring team. Offers will be extended both verbally and in written format.

  



If you think that you have been a victim of fraud,


* Check the identity of the talent team on LinkedIn.
* Check the existence of the position on our website https://owkin.com/hiring
* Notify Owkin's recruitment unit at this address hiring@owkin.com
* contact the following authorities:
* + \\[FR] https://www.internet\\-signalement.gouv.fr/
	+ \\[UK] https://www.actionfraud.police.uk/reporting\\-fraud\\-and\\-cyber\\-crime
	+ \\[US] https://reportfraud.ftc.gov/

title: Solutions & Services Specialist - ThinkShield Cybersecurity
description:
General Information
  
  

Req \\#
  
  

WD00078105
  
  

**Career area:**  

Sales
  
  

**Country/Region:**  

France
  
  

**State:**  

Hauts\\-de\\-Seine

Rueil\\-Malmaison

Monday, February 17, 2025
  
  

**Working time:**  

Full\\-time
  
  

**Additional Locations :**  

* France \\- Hauts\\-de\\-Seine \\- Rueil\\-Malmaison


Why Work at Lenovo
  
  

We are Lenovo. We do what we say. We own what we do. We WOW our customers.
  
Lenovo is a US$57 billion revenue global technology powerhouse, ranked \\#248 in the Fortune Global 500, and serving millions of customers every day in 180 markets. Focused on a bold vision to deliver Smarter Technology for All, Lenovo has built on its success as the world’s largest PC company with a full\\-stack portfolio of AI\\-enabled, AI\\-ready, and AI\\-optimized devices (PCs, workstations, smartphones, tablets), infrastructure (server, storage, edge, high performance computing and software defined infrastructure), software, solutions, and services. Lenovo’s continued investment in world\\-changing innovation is building a more equitable, trustworthy, and smarter future for everyone, everywhere. Lenovo is listed on the Hong Kong stock exchange under Lenovo Group Limited (HKSE: 992\\) (ADR: LNVGY).
  
This transformation together with Lenovo’s world\\-changing innovation is building a more inclusive, trustworthy, and smarter future for everyone, everywhere. To find out more visit www.lenovo.com , and read about the latest news via our StoryHub .
  
  

Description and Requirements
  
  

Join Lenovo ThinkShield and play a key role in growing the software business within the world’s \\#1 PC and device manufacturer. We seek a dynamic individual who will engage with the sales teams to provide presales technical expertise and deliver product demonstrations, proofs\\-of\\-concept, and sales training for our ThinkShield cybersecurity team in EMEA.
  
If you are the right candidate, you have worked closely with sales professionals and have delivered successful software implementations. You’re passionate about what you do. You have impeccable relational skills and can create win/win environments for all parties you work with. You are comfortable in a quasi\\-sales role and have experience working directly with customers. You’re driven \\- no one needs to push you to excel; it’s just who you are. You’re eager to learn, adapt and perfect your skills; you seek help and put it to good use. If this describes you, we would love to speak with you!
  
  

**RESPONSIBILITIES:**  

Primary technical resource to support our EMEA sales team on their opportunities and prospects, supporting prospects in understanding Lenovo’s ThinkShield cybersecurity offerings at a business and technical level that include security technologies: Endpoint Detection and Response (EDR/MDR/XDR), supply chain security, firmware security, Security Information and Event Management (SIEM), Data Loss Prevention (DLP), Network Detection \\& Response (NDR), Security Operations Center (SOC), Patching, Security Risk Assessments, Threat Hunting (TH), Managed Detection and Response (MDR), Unified Endpoint Management (UEM) / Mobile Device Management (MDM), Passwordless MFA, Encryption, VPN and Zero Trust Network Access (ZTNA), Digital User Experience (DEX), and more.
  
Architect and implement security solutions using security reference architecture and best practices for customers across all market verticals and from SMB, Mid\\-Market, Public Sector, Enterprise, and Global Accounts.
  
Provide presales technical assistance as well as product training to customers, partners, and sales teams. Work closely with Lenovo channel partners and their customers to provide excellent customer service.
  
Represent the company in key initiatives and develop relationships with relevant IT security business partners and system integrators.
  
Support the GTM motion for the EMEA geography and execute on sales pipeline on a quarterly/yearly basis.
  
Deliver demos, Proofs\\-of\\-Concept (PoC)/Proof of Value (PoV) at the customer, partner locations, or virtually as needed.
  
Stay current with industry trends, emerging technologies, and the competitive landscape to provide informed recommendations to sales teams and clients.
  
Collaborate with teams from Sales Teams, Product Management, DevOps, Partner/Channel, Customer Support, Services, Marketing, and Leadership.
  
Train, certify, and support partner technical engineers on Lenovo ThinkShield Cybersecurity solutions.
  
  

**EXPERIENCE/QUALIFICATIONS:**  

5\\+ years’ experience selling cyber security solutions and technology.
  
In\\-depth knowledge of cybersecurity technologies, including firewalls, intrusion detection/prevention systems, endpoint security (EDR/XDR/MDR), encryption, and various compliance standards including GDPR, ISO27001, NIST, PCI DSS, Healthcare, NIS2, DORA, etc..
  
Understanding or previous experience on UEM applications including Microsoft Intune, SCCM, Ivanti patch is a plus.
  
Strong understanding of network security, cloud security, and related technologies.
  
Excellent presentation and communication skills, with the ability to convey technical concepts to diverse audiences.
  
Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a fast\\-paced environment.
  
Full professional fluency in French and English.
  
This position may require up to 40% travel.
  
  

**What we will offer you:**  

Medical Insurance
  
Pension/ Retirement Plan
  
Employee Referral Bonus
  
Children of Lenovo Employees Scholarship Program
  
Lenovo and Motorola Product Discounts
  
Internal E\\-learning Development Platform Available for Employees
  
Employee Assistance Program, e.g., for health, legal \\& financial consultancy
  
50% reimbursement of the public transportation cost (Paris area \\- Rueil Malmaison)
  
  

We are an Equal Opportunity Employer and do not discriminate against any employee or applicant for employment because of race, color, sex, age, religion, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, status as a veteran, and basis of disability or any federal, state, or local protected class.
  
  

**Additional Locations :**  

* France \\- Hauts\\-de\\-Seine \\- Rueil\\-Malmaison
* France
* France \\- Hauts\\-de\\-Seine
* France \\- Hauts\\-de\\-Seine \\- Rueil\\-Malmaison


AI PROCESSING NOTICE
  
We use AI\\-based tools to support some of our processes (e.g. online interviews recordings and transcripts) in order to achieve better efficiency, accuracy and for our documentation purposes. AI can make mistakes, but we always make sure that the outputs are manually reviewed by a human. You can always opt\\-out or contact us in case of any question.

title: HANA Senior Solution Analyst
description:
As part of the Financial Production Crew, you will be a referent for all activities related to SAP reporting product:  



* Organize the “Build” and “Run” of SAP reporting
* Manage the BW HANA environment, at both infrastructure and application levels:
	+ SAP HANA,
	+ SAP BW
	+ Analysis for Office
* Be an advisor for Finance department
* Contribute to the evolutions roadmap, to meet Finance strategy and requirements
* Monitor and implement the roadmap and deliverables
* Provide insight to build SAP Reporting budgets (OPEX and CAPEX)
* Manage the Business as Usual for SAP Reporting, maintaining a high quality of service, but also trying to optimize and challenge when relevant
* Ensure coordination to support projects, BAU, business changes and innovation
* Support major Group projects impacting SAP environments (e.g., IFRS17\\)
* Constantly look forward to bringing value to SCOR finance processes (quick wins, innovation, enhancements) to better serve Finance customers
Monitor licenses compliance and versions compatibility of the whole SAP Reporting scope  
* 

* Build and maintain a trustful relationship with all stakeholders to be involved
* Actively support transformation initiatives of SCOR IT (e.g., DevOps, agility)
* Support the relationship with SCOR stakeholders (IT, Finance and Business)
Be customer oriented with a strong reliability on deadlines and ensure this mindset is spread within the HANA reporting squad  
* 

* Lead Enterprise Risk Management on BW Hana environment
* Support all audits in your area and potential certification projects that may be asked in the coming years

  
As a technico\\-functional referent of the HANA reporting squad, you contribute to the reporting based on all SAP solutions:


* Help define, monitor and implement the roadmap and ensure delivery for Reporting on SAP (“Build”), in alignment with Finance business requirements and strategy
* Manage the Business as Usual, ensuring relevancy and continuous delivery for Reporting on SAP, evolutions and user support with a high quality of service (“Run”)
* Support continuous improvement and development of the BW environment around a consistent and fully integrated business / technology roadmap
* Ensure rigorous Project Management, build a collaboration and trustful atmosphere with all stakeholders in a challenging context

  
**Required experience \\& competencies**

* 10\\+ years as BW HANA technico functional expert, with project leading abilities
Full proficiency in English and French (written and spoken)  
* 

**Required Education**

* Master’s degree in Business, Finance or Engineer profile or equivalent experience

  
As a leading global reinsurer, SCOR offers its clients a diversified and innovative range of reinsurance and insurance solutions and services to control and manage risk. Applying “The Art \\& Science of Risk,” SCOR uses its industry\\-recognized expertise and cutting\\-edge financial solutions to serve its clients and contribute to the welfare and resilience of society in around 160 countries worldwide.


Working at SCOR means engaging with some of the best minds in the industry – actuaries, data scientists, underwriters, risk modelers, engineers, and many others – as we work together to find solutions to pressing challenges facing societies.


As an international company, our common culture is defined by “The SCOR Way.” Serving both to build momentum that drives the Group forward and as a compass to guide our actions and choices, The SCOR Way is anchored by five core values, reflecting the input of employees at all levels of the Group. We care about clients, people, and societies. We perform with integrity. We act with courage. We encourage open minds. And we thrive through collaboration.

title: Senior Software Quality Analyst
description:
**Senior Software Quality Analyst**

  



**Location:** Europe\\-Based (Office/ Hybrid/ Remote).

 **Position Summary:**

  

The Advanced Visualization team at Bentley Systems is seeking a Senior Software Quality Analyst. At Bentley Systems, we provide solutions for complex engineering projects, supporting users who design, build, and operate global infrastructure. Understanding their needs is crucial, and the Unreal Developer plays a vital role in this.

  

We are looking for a highly skilled Senior Software Quality Analyst with expertise in automated QA and testing to join our team. As a member of the Development team, you will leverage your expertise to enhance advanced 3D visualization experiences for architects, urban planners, and other engineering professionals, focusing on testing strategies and test automation.

  

We value initiative, attention to detail, critical analysis of testing processes, and a willingness to explore new methods to improve efficiency and quality.

 **We will rely on you for the following:**

  

* Design, develop, and execute automated tests for Unreal Engine products.
* Work closely with development teams to identify, document, and track bugs and performance issues using tracking systems such as Jira or DevOps.
* Setting standards and leading the performance and automated testing effort.
* Work with the QA team to integrate automated tests into the overall testing strategy.
* Ensuring that test environments are up\\-to\\-date and cost\\-effective.
* Analyze and optimize game performance, including memory, rendering, and physics systems.
* Debug and troubleshoot issues in real\\-time environments to maintain performance targets.
* Provide clear documentation for testing processes

  



**What You Bring to The Team:**

  

* 6\\+ years of professional experience as QA with Unreal Engineer Products
* Experience with QA Tools such as Automation Systems, Functional Test Frameworks, and Debug Tools.
* Strong experience in testing methodologies and best practices for game/software development.
* Experience with Bug\\-tracking tools such as Jira or DevOps.
* Experience with Automation tools such as Selenium or SikuliX
* Experience with Testing frameworks (e.g., Unreal Automation Tool).
* Strong communication and collaboration skills.
* Experience with version control systems Git, and Perforce.
* Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines and testing integrations

  

**What would make you stand out:**

* Experience in VR/AR development.
* Knowledge of shader/material creation and optimization.
* Familiarity with scripting languages like Python for automation tasks.
* Familiarity with shipping AAA or indie games.

  



**Note: Open to candidates with experience in Unreal Engine as a Software Engineer, with a mixed role involving both development and automation.**

 **What We Offer:**

  



* A great Team and culture – please see our Recruitment Video.
* An exciting career as an integral part of a world\\-leading software company providing solutions for architecture, engineering, and construction.
* Competitive Salary and benefits.
* The opportunity to work within a global and diversely international team.
* A supportive and collaborative environment.
* Colleague Recognition Awards

 **About Bentley Systems:**

  

Bentley Systems (Nasdaq: BSY) is the infrastructure engineering software company. We provide innovative software to advance the world’s infrastructure – sustaining both the global economy and environment. Our industry\\-leading software solutions are used by professionals, and organizations of every size, for the design, construction, and operations of roads and bridges, rail and transit, water and wastewater, public works and utilities, buildings and campuses, mining, and industrial facilities. Our offerings, powered by the iTwin Platform for infrastructure digital twins, include MicroStation and Bentley Open applications for modeling and simulation, Seequent’s software for geoprofessionals, and Bentley Infrastructure Cloud encompassing ProjectWise for project delivery, SYNCHRO for construction management, and AssetWise for asset operations. Bentley Systems’ 5,200 colleagues generate annual revenues of more than $1 billion in 194 countries.


www.bentley.com

 **Equal Opportunity Employer:**

  

Bentley is proud to be an equal opportunity employer and considers for employment all qualified applicants without regard to race, color, gender/gender identity, sexual orientation, disability, marital status, religion/belief, national origin, caste, age, or any other characteristic protected by local law or unrelated to job qualifications.

 **\\#LI\\-VP**

**\\#LI\\-Remote**

 **Senior Software Quality Analyst**

  



**Location:** Europe\\-Based (Office/ Hybrid/ Remote).

 **Position Summary:**

  

The Advanced Visualization team at Bentley Systems is seeking a Senior Software Quality Analyst. At Bentley Systems, we provide solutions for complex engineering projects, supporting users who design, build, and operate global infrastructure. Understanding their needs is crucial, and the Unreal Developer plays a vital role in this.

  

We are looking for a highly skilled Senior Software Quality Analyst with expertise in automated QA and testing to join our team. As a member of the Development team, you will leverage your expertise to enhance advanced 3D visualization experiences for architects, urban planners, and other engineering professionals, focusing on testing strategies and test automation.

  

We value initiative, attention to detail, critical analysis of testing processes, and a willingness to explore new methods to improve efficiency and quality.

 **We will rely on you for the following:**

  

* Design, develop, and execute automated tests for Unreal Engine products.
* Work closely with development teams to identify, document, and track bugs and performance issues using tracking systems such as Jira or DevOps.
* Setting standards and leading the performance and automated testing effort.
* Work with the QA team to integrate automated tests into the overall testing strategy.
* Ensuring that test environments are up\\-to\\-date and cost\\-effective.
* Analyze and optimize game performance, including memory, rendering, and physics systems.
* Debug and troubleshoot issues in real\\-time environments to maintain performance targets.
* Provide clear documentation for testing processes

  



**What You Bring to The Team:**

  

* 6\\+ years of professional experience as QA with Unreal Engineer Products
* Experience with QA Tools as Automation System, Functional Test Framework, and Debug Tools.
* Strong experience of testing methodologies and best practices for game/software development.
* Experience with Bug\\-tracking tools such as Jira or DevOps.
* Experience with Automation tools as Selenium or SikuliX
* Experience with Testing frameworks (e.g., Unreal Automation Tool).
* Strong communication and collaboration skills.
* Experience with version control systems Git, Perforce.
* Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines and testing integrations

  

**What would make you stand out:**

* Experience in VR/AR development.
* Knowledge of shader/material creation and optimization.
* Familiarity with scripting languages like Python for automation tasks.
* Familiarity in shipping AAA or indie games.

  



**Note: Open to candidates with experience in Unreal Engine as a Software Engineer, with a mixed role involving both development and automation.**

 **What We Offer:**

  



* A great Team and culture – please see our Recruitment Video.
* An exciting career as an integral part of a world\\-leading software company providing solutions for architecture, engineering, and construction.
* Competitive Salary and benefits.
* The opportunity to work within a global and diversely international team.
* A supportive and collaborative environment.
* Colleague Recognition Awards

 **\\#LI\\-VP**

**\\#LI\\-Remote**

description:

Ce datalake CIO Office a également pour vocation de devenir la brique centrale de l'architecture du SI CIO Office.

Nous recherchons un profil Hadoop / PySpark qui sera en charge, en lien avec l'équipe de production applicative / devops, de mettre en ?uvre techniquement les évolutions du datalake CIO Office. Passionné par les données, capable de s?adapter à un environnement dynamique et en constante évolution, le prestataire doit faire preuve d'autonomie, d'initiative et d'une forte capacité d'analyse pour résoudre des problèmes complexes.
  
  

**Les tâches suivantes seront confiés au consultant :**  

? Mettre en ?uvre de nouvelles ingestions de données, data prep/transformation
  
  

? Maintenir et faire évoluer nos outils de gestion des pipeline de données (Pyspark \\+ shell scripting)
  
  

? Adresser à l'équipe devops les demandes relatives aux évolutions de la plateforme
  
  

? Eventuellement mettre en ?uvre une couche d'APIs afin d'exposer nos données

title: DevOps engineer
description:
**About AODocs**



We are a SaaS software as a service company, and our content service platform AODocs is used by 500 customers, including large enterprises like Veolia, Equifax, Solvay or Air Liquide to manage their business critical documents. AODocs ensures that information is easily accessible by the people who need it, while being protected against unauthorized content and human errors, and that business processes are properly followed, with full traceability. For example, AODocs helps Google ensure the design documents of its data centers are properly controlled, accelerating the construction projects while avoiding costly mistakes.



AODocs is a growing and profitable company, recognized (by top analyst firm Gartner, and by its own customers) as one of the most modern solutions in a market populated by legacy, pre\\-cloud systems like OpenText, IBM Filenet, Hyland and others. This market is now being disrupted by the new generative AI technologies, which allows software to understand the content of a company’s documents, and thus to automate tasks that previously required human work, such as document tagging, data extraction from unstructured text, or analysis of complex documents.



We believe the generative AI will dramatically change the way companies create and use their business content, and since the beginning of the year, we have made it a priority to integrate this new technology in our product. The combination of the generative AI capabilities to understand and generate text, with our existing document management and workflow features, enables a large number of high value use cases, from contracts management to RFP responses, audit reports, or recruitment processes.



We have offices in Paris, Atlanta and Milan as well as people based all over the world (remote work). Part of the Group Revevol, we work in a very **collaborative** and **transparent** manner: key metrics are communicated broadly, on a weekly basis, and decisions are discussed collectively, not behind closed doors. We believe that good ideas can come from anyone, regardless of their formal job role. We are growing quickly, and looking for new talent that will help us reach new heights.


***Why are we recruiting?***



We are opening a new location in the EU to host our application and provide to our customers a GDPR compliant platform, and we want to provide a global approach to the infrastructure as code for all teams in the group. We are looking for highly motivated DevOps Engineer who will be part of our team in Europe. The candidate will be closed with our international development teams in the USA, Italy, Hungary, and France.



Your missions


* Ensure that services are designed and delivered to be mission critical with a focus on security, resiliency, scale, and performance.
* Define and implement improvements in service architecture, both current and future, together with the development team.
* Communicate the scale, capacity, security, performance attributes, and requirements of the services you own.
* Define and manage instrumentation and metrics that clearly describe the service behaviors scaling requirements and patterns resiliency and recoverability, ensuring that backup/restore and disaster recovery capabilities are defined, implemented, tested, and maintained
* Define and manage automation and orchestration environments on SaaS environments.
* Incident response, troubleshooting, root\\-cause analysis, and postmortems.
* Establish and maintain Service\\-Level Objectives (SLOs) for production services
* Analyze and manage cloud costs.
* Coordinate with relevant teams to build useful tools.
* Mentor engineers on best practices of running and maintaining a production.
* Help DevOps team on CI/CD topics.


**You**


* Between 3 to 7 years of experience in a DevOps or SRE position, working in a production environment.
* **Demonstrable experience in one or more scripting/programming languages:** such as Python,Bash, Go, Java, javascript.
* Strong experience in a public cloud (GCP or AWS).
* Experience with serverless solution in one or more cloud providers.
* Experience with Terraform.
* Experience or interest in building dashboards for Application monitoring and reporting (google cloud monitoring Datadog or else).
* Experience implementing a Continuous Integration (CI) and Continuous Deployment (CD) pipeline (github action or google cloud build)
* Working knowledge of container management and orchestration tools (Docker, kubernetes).
* Ideally knowledge in SQL, NoSQL and elasticsearch.
* IT Security and compliance knowledge.
* **Languages: French and English at professional level.**

title: Data Engineer – Cloud & Streaming (E-commerce) H/F
description:
Au sein d’une équipe **Data \\& Performance**, vous interviendrez sur la **gestion et transformation des données digitales** issues d’un écosystème e\\-commerce international. Vous serez impliqué(e) dans **la mise en place et l’optimisation des pipelines de données**, en assurant leur **qualité, sécurité et conformité GDPR**.

**Développement et automatisation des pipelines de données**

* Développer et optimiser des **pipelines SQL / SQLX** sous **DataForm (similaire DBT)**.
* Concevoir des **pipelines Python** pour **Cloud Data Flow (Apache Beam serverless – GCP)**.
* Intégrer et transformer des **données issues d’APIs partenaires** via **Cloud Functions (GCP)**.

**Gestion et traitement des flux de données (Streaming \\& Batch)**

* Assurer la gestion des flux via **Kafka, SNS/SQS, Cloud PubSub**.
* Superviser l’intégration et la récupération de données entre **AWS et GCP**.
* Développer des **pipelines DataFlow en Python** pour le traitement des données en temps réel.
* Vérifier et garantir l’**anonymisation des données** conformément à la **GDPR**.

**Data Engineering \\& Qualité des Données**

* Assurer l’**intégrité, la sécurité et la gouvernance** des données dans un **Data Lake / Data Warehouse** (BigQuery).
* Mettre en place des **standards de qualité et documentation technique** (Data Lineage).
* Collaborer avec les équipes **Data Analysts \\& ML Ops** pour améliorer la performance des modèles.

**Développement et DevOps**

* Participer à l’**écriture, au déploiement et à la maintenance du code Python**.
* Travailler avec **Git, tests unitaires, intégration continue** pour garantir un code robuste.
* Contribuer à l’évolution des **standards de développement collaboratif** au sein de l’équipe.


Vous disposez d’une expérience **minimum de 4 ans** en **Data Engineering**, avec une expertise avancée sur les **environnements Cloud et le traitement de données**.

**Compétences techniques requises :**

* **Maîtrise de Python et SQL** (BigQuery, DataForm, T\\-SQL).
* Expérience sur **GCP (BigQuery, Cloud DataFlow, PubSub, Cloud Functions)** ou **Cloud équivalent**.
* Connaissance des **technologies de streaming** (Kafka, SNS/SQS, Apache Beam).
* Expérience sur **ETL / transformation de données**.
* Bonne pratique du **développement collaboratif** (Git, CI/CD, tests unitaires).
* Sensibilité aux **enjeux GDPR** et protection des données.

**Bonus :**

* Expérience dans le **e\\-commerce** ou le **luxe**.
* Connaissance des outils de **visualisation** (LookerStudio, PowerBI).
* Connaissances en **Machine Learning**.

**Soft skills :**

* Excellente **communication écrite et orale**.
* Capacité à vulgariser des concepts techniques.
* Curiosité et force de proposition sur l’évolution des technologies et process.


Qui sommes nous ?


Opstim est une ESN indépendante, spécialisée dans l’accompagnement des projets en culture DevOps et dans le pilotage IT.  

  

Crée en 2021 à Paris, Opstim rassemble une communauté de spécialistes passionnés par leurs métiers et qui interviennent au sein des DSI françaises à fort enjeux.  

  

Opstim est une structure souple qui valorise le caractère unique de chacun et promet d’assurer efficacité et bien\\-être au travail.  

  

Notre structure repose sur des valeurs fortes tels que l’entraide et la confiance, et propose un modèle inclusif du consulting alliant efficacité et sentiment d’appartenance.  

  

« Efficaces qu’ensemble », nous sommes convaincus que l’accomplissement professionnel et l’épanouissement personnel de chacun ne peut se réaliser pleinement qu’à travers l’interaction forte entre pairs.  

  

Rejoindre Opstim, c'est intégrer une communauté de passionnés et participer à une aventure humaine qui véhicule des valeurs fortes.
